alert.note: Alert for DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Polk (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 8:01PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Highlands, eastern Hardee, south central Polk and DeSoto Counties through 845 PM EDT... At 801 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Bartow to near Avon Park to near Arcadia. Movement was southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds of 40 to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sebring, Avon Park, Arcadia, Lake Placid, Sebring Regional Airport, Southeast Arcadia, Sylvan Shores, Lake Istokpoga, Sweetwater, Fort Meade, Zolfo Springs, Nocatee, Brownville, Sebring Shores, Lake Josephine, Placid Lakes, Archbold, Avon Park Executive Airport, Gardner, and Crewsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: DeSoto; Hardee; Highlands; Inland Charlotte; Polk
